main event: Two test pilots observed a stationary light in the sky while flying near Isa Angeles, California, on July 30, 1954.
interesting points: The object remained approximately stationary and was estimated to be at an altitude of 15,000-20,000 feet., The pilots described the object as bright and luminous., The object appeared smaller than an aircraft., The pilots attempted to climb to 11,000 feet and make turns to get a better view, but the object did not change size, shape, or position., The conclusion stated that the sighting was possibly astronomical with insufficient data for further evaluation.
sighted object: a bright and luminous stationary light
witness description: two test pilots flying a B-23 for Hughes Aircraft Corp
